title: Crime Alert 09.06.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.06.18
description:
Rudy Giuliani says he will try to block public reports of Mueller investigation about Russia's election interference. Manufacturer ramps up production of bulletproof backpacks. Couple gets creative, opens a drive-thru window at home to sell drugs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
